geneVariantDescriptions.description: NTRK1 V3_splice (TrkAIII) is a splice variant that results in the skipping of exons 6, 7, and 9 of the canonical NTRK1 transcript, leading to a loss of the D4 Ig-like domain (PMID: 15488758). V3_splice results in constitutive tyrosine phosphorylation, increased NF-kappa B and PI3K/Akt signaling, transformation activity in cell culture, and tumor growth in mouse models (PMID: 15488758).

references.title: TrkA alternative splicing: a regulated tumor-promoting switch in human neuroblastoma.
